evidence.claim: Capitola utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure services.
The company adheres to HIPAA regulations for security and compliance in health-tech.
Capitola implements FHIR standards for interoperability in their health solutions.
Capitola employs X12 for electronic data interchange related to healthcare transactions.

icp.icp_reason: Capitola uses HIPAA and X12 standards, indicating they facilitate healthcare data exchange.
